title: The best Samsung Black Friday deals 2021
author: alex-whitelock
summary: We've got QLED TVs, Samsung Galaxy devices, and much more
article: The big day is here but Samsung's Black Friday deals have already been blazing away for a few days now. Not to say you're late - there are still tons of amazing promotions to check out at the official site and at other leading retailers too. We've picked out our favorites and rounded them up right here on this page, including cheap 4K TVs, QLEDs, Galaxy S21 smartphones, and a ton of tablets and laptops too. Some of our favorite tech of 2021 is on sale today so most of our selections come with glowing recommendations from our rigorous user testing. Be aware though - we've already seen a couple of Samsung Black Friday deals sell out on some higher demand items, so definitely don't hang around if you're interested.

So far, our absolute highlight has to be the stunning Samsung QN900A Neo QLED TV on sale for $3,299.99 (was $4,999.99). Yes, we know it's expensive, but it's the best TV we've ever reviewed here at TechRadar - and this eye-watering $1,700 discount brings it down to its cheapest ever price. Another pick today can be found with the Galaxy S21 series smartphones - now retailing for $699 (S21), $849 (S21 Plus), and $999 (S21 Ultra) respectively. All these prices are within $50 of the cheapest ever for these devices unlocked - a sum that's made up by the free $50 store credit Samsung is throwing in on top.

Because we've had a lot of visitors from the UK in recent days we've also decided to add in the best prices on our favorite models for that side of the pond. The official UK Samsung Black Friday deals are a little weaker than their US counterparts, but there are some really decent prices from Currys, Very, and Amazon today, which we've price-checked and included accordingly. So far, the best UK deal is on the brand new Galaxy Buds Live - going for just £69 at Amazon - easily the cheapest price yet. If you're looking for something else, then there are also great options on TVs and phones in the UK today too.

Simply scroll down to your relevant section to see this year's best Black Friday deals on Samsung tech. We're rounding up plenty more down below and we'll be adding plenty more in as we get closer to Black Friday itself too, so don't forget to bookmark this page.
